{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-XU |revision=4 |asin=B0163GEA64 |price=74 |est_release_date=07/2015 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_len=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=Exynos 5422;(5 Octa); |cpu1_cspeed=1.4-2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=8 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=PoP |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 1.8V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8153 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMIC for 2.7-5.0V;Samsung;S2MPS11;;1; ,,, 4-port USB 3.1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3521;;1; ,,, Overvoltage Protection Circuit;ON Semiconductor;NCP372;;2; ,,, Power Distribution Switch;ON Semiconductor;NCP380;;1; |flags=HDMI 1.4, MicroSD Card slot, eMMC module connector, RTC w/ battery backup, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.10.105;Ubuntu 16.04; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=odroid |default_pass=odroid |oui_eth=00:1E:06 }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - ODROID-XU4}} :[https://www.hardkernel.com/shop/odroid-xu4-special-price/ Product page]
eMMC module connector for eMMC5.0 HS400 Flash Storage modules of :8GB, 16GB and 32GB available. RAM is LPDDR3 PoP with processor.
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-xu4/odroid-xu4 ''ODROID-XU4'' on '''ODROID''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/07/14/odroid-xu4-board-is-a-smaller-and-cheaper-version-of-odroid-xu3/ ''ODROID-XU4'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Samsung]] ''Exynos'' 5422 (5 Octa) :4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @2.0GHz + :4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.4GHz *GPU: ARM Mali-T628 MP6 @533MHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, :eMMC 5.0 HS400 connector *RAM: 2GB LPDDR3 @933MHz
===See also=== :;[[ODROID]] • [[Amlogic]] • [[Intel Celeron]] • [[Espressif Systems]] • [[Samsung]] *[[ODROID-C0]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1+]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C2]] - ''Amlogic'' S905 4-cores ARM Cortex-A53 CPU @2.0GHz *[[ODROID-GO]] - ''Espressif Systems'' ESP32 Dual Core LX6 @240MHz *[[ODROID-H2]] - ''Intel'' J4105 4-cores Celeron @2.5GHz *[[ODROID-HC1]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-HC2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM Cortex-A73 @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM Cortex-A53 @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU
